name: fullstack-app
description: Full-stack web app with React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and Supabase

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.db:push: cd server && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
